p:
The minimum and maximum values from the host availability raster were extracted and used for normalizing the dataset on a scale of 0 to 1. The minimum area under which B. zonataâ€™ host plants are being grown in hectares according to the MapSPAM dataset was 0 and the maximum was 13579.3 hectares. The minimum and maximum values for the climatic suitability models extracted from the MaxEnt model outputs were used to normalize the dataset as shown in
Table 2 .
